properties.entry: SELECT CM.REF_CNO, CLASS_GRADE, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, TEACHER_NAME, ATPT_OFCDC_SC_CODE, SD_SCHUL_CODE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_MEMBER WHERE REF_CNO = CM.REF_CNO) AS USER_COUNT FROM CLASS_MEMBER CM LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON (CM.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) WHERE CM.REF_UNO = ?
